about_the_game:
Take command of a war machine and try to survive in a brutal war for the right to become the Emperor of the Islands.

Storyline

Every 100 years, a futa warrior appears on the islands of Shizuyaki province, who must pass difficult tests and subjugate the islanders. In this he is opposed by anime girls, who are the guardians of these islands. In return, futa will receive the power of battle robots and the favor of the most beautiful anime girls, who will be ready to do any order.

Gameplay

  • You will be able to customize the battle mech to your liking
  • Different attack and defense system choices to help you win battles against other mechs
  • More than 10 unique anime girls with unique characters

Hot 🍓 Content

After completing each challenge, racy scenes with a futa warrior and anime girls will open up for you. The scenes include a choice of poses. None of the strawberry scene will leave you indifferent.

and more...

Exciting battles, exciting story and lots of hot strawberry content are waiting for you. Destroy enemies with incredible attacks to pass missions. Win battles and get parts to improve your mech. You will also be able to customize Futari to your taste and color.

Become the emperor of the islands and gain power over all the islands!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains images of sex and strong language.

This game contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages or for viewing at work.
Specifically, it includes depictions of sexual acts, revealing outfits, nudity, sex animations, masturbation all of which are portrayed graphically.

These elements are integral to the storyline and character development within the game, contributing to the overall narrative experience. 

All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 6.1
  • Storage: 1540 MB available space

short_description: Sexy Futa: Mecha Battles of Islands is a role-playing game where you can choose a mecha, customize its appearance to your liking and engage in battle with huge fighting machines in danger-filled locations. Get ready for uncompromising confrontation!
